meanings.definition: A form of government in which power is vested in three rulers.
meanings.sent1: The triarchy of three leaders worked together to make decisions.
meanings.sent2: The triarchy in that country consists of a king, a queen, and a prime minister.
meanings.sent3: The triarchy of siblings decided to take turns choosing what game to play.
meanings.sent4: In the triarchy of friends, each had a unique role in the group dynamic.
meanings.sent5: The triarchy of classmates led to a fair distribution of responsibilities.
